caption: [PLAYER] slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away. The ball goes behind for a corner. [TEAM] will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
[PLAYER] whips a promising cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.
Goal! [PLAYER] provides [PLAYER] with a nice pass inside the box. It allows him to finish with a precise effort into the bottom right corner. 1:0.
